#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked 
void getn(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
int main()
{ int t,n,s[100001];
  //scanf("%d",&n);
  getn(n);
  for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
     getn(s[i]);//scanf("%d",&s[i]);
  getn(t);//scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
       { int a,b,flag=0;
	     getn(a);getn(b);//scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
		 for(int i=a+1;2*i<=b+a;i++)
		    { if(s[i]>s[a] || s[b-i+a]>s[a])
		        { flag=1;
		          break;
		        }
		    }  
		 if(flag==0)
		   printf("YES\n");
		 else
		     printf("NO\n");     
       }
}
